title: Did UN Official Say Nations Would Vanish If Global Warming Not Reversed by 2000?
subtitle: An Associated Press article from 1989 is popular among climate-change deniers.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: In 1989, a senior U.N. environmental official said, “Entire nations could be wiped off the face of the Earth by rising sea levels if the global warming trend is not reversed by the year 2000.”
